content.rendered:
Current list of people under my supervision:

(see also https://team.inria.fr/scool/team-members/ for details)

PhD

  • Fabien Pesquerel, 2020 on-going
  • Patrick Saux, with Philippe Preux 2020 on-going
  • Hassan Saber, 2018 on-going
  • Dorian Baudry, with Emilie Kaufmann 2019 on-going
  • Réda Ouhamma, with Vianney Perchet 2019 on-going

Postdoc

  • Timothée Mathieu, 2021 on-going

Engineer

  • Hernán David Carvajal, 2021 on-going

Undergraduates

 

Former list of people under my supervision:

PhD

  • Réda Alami, with Raphael Feraud, Michele Sebag Orange Labs, CIFRE, defended 2021.
  • Édouard Leurent, with Denis Efimov Renault, CIFRE, since Oct. 2018, defended October 30th, 2020
  • Sheikh Waqas Akhtar, 2017
  • Nicolas Galichet, with Michele Sebag, defended 2015.
  • Robin Allesiardo, with Raphael Feraud, Michele Sebag, Orange Labs, CIFRE, defended 2016.

Postdoc

  • Mohammad Sadegh Talebi, June 2018 – Jan 31st, 2020

Undergraduates (only from 2017)

  • Thomas Carta, since Apr 2021
  • Elvis Jourdant, since Apr 27th, 2020
  • Abel Adary, since Apr 14th, 2020
  • Guillaume Flament, since Apr 1st, 2020
  • Fabien Pesquerel, since Apr 20th, 2020
  • Reda Ouhamma, Ecole Polytechnique, Jun – July 2019
  • Hippolyte Bourel, ENS Rennes, Feb – June 2019
  • Hassan Saber, since April 2018, CentraleSupélec
  • Mahsa Asadi, Shiraz University, Sep-Dec 2017
  • Subhojyoti Mukherjee, Indian Institute of technology, Sep-Nov 2017
  • Iuliia Olkhovskaia, Moscow Institute of Physics and Technology, February – July 2017
